mapper.select: select CorpId, CorpCode, CorpName, CorpType, LicenseNum, Address, ZipCode, LegalMan, LegalManDuty, LegalManIdCardType, LegalManIdCardNumber, RegisterDate, EstablishDate, OfficPhone, FaxNumber, LinkMan, LinkPhone, SignName, SignUrl, Email, Website, CreateDate, ModifyDate from corpbasicinfo where CorpId = #{corpid}

select CorpId, CorpCode, CorpName, CorpType, LicenseNum, Address, ZipCode, LegalMan, LegalManDuty, LegalManIdCardType, LegalManIdCardNumber, RegisterDate, EstablishDate, OfficPhone, FaxNumber, LinkMan, LinkPhone, SignName, SignUrl, Email, Website, CreateDate, ModifyDate from corpbasicinfo limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select CorpId, CorpCode, CorpName, CorpType, LicenseNum, Address, ZipCode, LegalMan, LegalManDuty, LegalManIdCardType, LegalManIdCardNumber, RegisterDate, EstablishDate, OfficPhone, FaxNumber, LinkMan, LinkPhone, SignName, SignUrl, Email, Website, CreateDate, ModifyDate from corpbasicinfo
mapper.insert: insert into corpbasicinfo(CorpCode, CorpName, CorpType, LicenseNum, Address, ZipCode, LegalMan, LegalManDuty, LegalManIdCardType, LegalManIdCardNumber, RegisterDate, EstablishDate, OfficPhone, FaxNumber, LinkMan, LinkPhone, SignName, SignUrl, Email, Website, CreateDate, ModifyDate) values (#{corpcode}, #{corpname}, #{corptype}, #{licensenum}, #{address}, #{zipcode}, #{legalman}, #{legalmanduty}, #{legalmanidcardtype}, #{legalmanidcardnumber}, #{registerdate}, #{establishdate}, #{officphone}, #{faxnumber}, #{linkman}, #{linkphone}, #{signname}, #{signurl}, #{email}, #{website}, #{createdate}, #{modifydate})
mapper.update:
update corpbasicinfo
CorpCode = #{corpcode},
CorpName = #{corpname},
CorpType = #{corptype},
LicenseNum = #{licensenum},
Address = #{address},
ZipCode = #{zipcode},
LegalMan = #{legalman},
LegalManDuty = #{legalmanduty},
LegalManIdCardType = #{legalmanidcardtype},
LegalManIdCardNumber = #{legalmanidcardnumber},
RegisterDate = #{registerdate},
EstablishDate = #{establishdate},
OfficPhone = #{officphone},
FaxNumber = #{faxnumber},
LinkMan = #{linkman},
LinkPhone = #{linkphone},
SignName = #{signname},
SignUrl = #{signurl},
Email = #{email},
Website = #{website},
CreateDate = #{createdate},
ModifyDate = #{modifydate},
where CorpId = #{corpid}
mapper.select: select CorpId, CorpCode, CorpName, CorpType, LicenseNum, Address, ZipCode, LegalMan, LegalManDuty, LegalManIdCardType, LegalManIdCardNumber, RegisterDate, EstablishDate, OfficPhone, FaxNumber, LinkMan, LinkPhone, SignName, SignUrl, Email, Website, CreateDate, ModifyDate from corpbasicinfo where CorpCode = #{corpcode}
